price: Yeroo obboleessi isaanii Saalih isaaniin jedhe: “Sila Rabbiin hin sodaattanii?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ صَٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum ṣāliḥun alā tattaqūna
